title: Race condition in rendering exposed by pull request #1078

content.raw:
A new test was added to joint_screw.cc in pull request #1078, which caused a race condition seg-fault in rendering.

The race condition causes the `ScrewJointLimitForce/0` (ode) to seg-fault (see [Jenkins test failure](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-nvidia/8/testReport/junit/%28root%29/INTEGRATION_joint_screw/test_ran/))
when all tests are run sequentially, though it doesn't happen if they are run individually (ie. `test/integration/INTEGRATION_joint_screw --gtest_filter="*ScrewJointLimitForce/0"` doesn't seg-fault).

Here are the console output and backtraces from running the ODE and simbody tests in sequence.

ODE tests: `test/integration/INTEGRATION_joint_screw --gtest_filter="*/0"`
~~~
$ gdb test/integration/INTEGRATION_joint_screw
...
(gdb) r --gtest_filter="*/0"
...
Note: Google Test filter = */0
[==========] Running 4 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 4 tests from PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.WrapAngle/0
[Dbg] [joint_test.hh:59] Params: (0x47905e pointing to "ode", 0x479076 pointing to "screw")
...
[       OK ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.WrapAngle/0 (1502 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointSetWorldPose/0
[Dbg] [joint_test.hh:59] Params: (0x47905e pointing to "ode", 0x479076 pointing to "screw")
...
[       OK ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointSetWorldPose/0 (984 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointForce/0
[Dbg] [joint_test.hh:59] Params: (0x47905e pointing to "ode", 0x479076 pointing to "screw")
...
[       OK ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointForce/0 (9366 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointLimitForce/0
[Dbg] [joint_test.hh:59] Params: (0x47905e pointing to "ode", 0x479076 pointing to "screw")
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.183

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffdb404700 (LWP 8384)]
0x00007ffff7052771 in gazebo::rendering::Visual::Init (this=this@entry=0x7fff4d266770, _name=..., _parent=..., 
    _useRTShader=<optimized out>) at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:146
146	  while (pnode->getCreator()->hasSceneNode(uniqueName))
~~~
~~~
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff7052771 in gazebo::rendering::Visual::Init (this=this@entry=0x7fff4d266770, _name=..., 
    _parent=..., _useRTShader=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:146
#1  0x00007ffff7055586 in gazebo::rendering::Visual::Visual (this=0x7fff4d266770, _name=..., _parent=..., 
    _useRTShader=<optimized out>) at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:51
#2  0x00007ffff70200ac in gazebo::rendering::Scene::ProcessVisualMsg (this=this@entry=0x7fffcc9afc90, _msg=...)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc:2347
#3  0x00007ffff702ab43 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::PreRender (this=0x7fffcc9afc90)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc:1705
#4  0x00007ffff7346adb in operator() (this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:767
#5  Signal (this=<optimized out>) at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:199
#6  operator() (this=<optimized out>) at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:188
#7  gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::ImageSensorContainer::Update (this=0x7fffcc31d8a0, _force=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:658
#8  0x00007ffff7346937 in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update (
    this=0x7ffff7906de0 <SingletonT<gazebo::sensors::SensorManager>::GetInstance()::t>, _force=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:157
#9  0x00000000004625f7 in gazebo::Server::Run (this=0x7fffce30e360)
    at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:474
#10 0x00000000004525e3 in ServerFixture::RunServer (this=0x746540, _worldFilename=..., _paused=<optimized out>, 
    _physics=...) at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.cc:233
#11 0x00007ffff5b2494a in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.53.0
#12 0x00007ffff6743f6e in start_thread (arg=0x7fffdb404700) at pthread_create.c:311
#13 0x00007ffff47719cd in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:113
(gdb)
~~~

Simbody tests: `test/integration/INTEGRATION_joint_screw --gtest_filter="*/2"`
~~~
(gdb) r --gtest_filter="*/2"
...
Note: Google Test filter = */2
[==========] Running 4 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 4 tests from PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.WrapAngle/2
[Dbg] [joint_test.hh:59] Params: (0x479069 pointing to "simbody", 0x479076 pointing to "screw")
...
[       OK ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.WrapAngle/2 (1611 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointSetWorldPose/2
[Dbg] [joint_test.hh:59] Params: (0x479069 pointing to "simbody", 0x479076 pointing to "screw")
[Err] [joint_screw.cc:129] Simbody Screw Joint will not work with Link::SetWorldPose. See issue #857.
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[       OK ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointSetWorldPose/2 (1 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointForce/2
...
[       OK ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointForce/2 (10726 ms)
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/JointTestScrew.ScrewJointLimitForce/2
[Dbg] [joint_test.hh:59] Params: (0x479069 pointing to "simbody", 0x479076 pointing to "screw")
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.183
[Err] [SimbodyPhysics.cc:1241] Collision type [33619968] unimplemented
...
[Dbg] [SimbodyHingeJoint.cc:55] SetAxis: setting axis is not yet implemented.  The axis are set  during joint construction in SimbodyPhysics.cc for now.
[Err] [SimbodyJoint.cc:386] SimbodyJoint::SetAnchor:  Not implement in Simbody. Anchor is set during joint construction in SimbodyPhysics.cc
[Dbg] [SimbodySliderJoint.cc:55] SetAxis Not implemented...

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffdb404700 (LWP 8483)]
0x00007ffff7052771 in gazebo::rendering::Visual::Init (this=this@entry=0x7fff575b17c0, _name=..., _parent=..., 
    _useRTShader=<optimized out>) at /home/scpeters/ws/gazebo/src/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:146
146	  while (pnode->getCreator()->hasSceneNode(uniqueName))
~~~
~~~
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff7052771 in gazebo::rendering::Visual::Init (this=this@entry=0x7fff575b17c0, _name=...,

@iche033

The race condition causes the ScrewJointLimitForce/0 (ode) to seg-fault (see Jenkins test failure) when all tests are run sequentially, though it doesn't happen if they are run individually (ie. test/integration/INTEGRATION_joint_screw --gtest_filter="*ScrewJointLimitForce/0" doesn't seg-fault).
